mapper.insert: INSERT INTO consultation ( `name`, sex, phone, qq, email, `desc`, address, insert_author, update_author ) VALUES ( #{name}, #{sex}, #{phone}, #{qq}, #{email}, #{desc}, #{address}, #{insert_author}, #{insert_author} );
mapper.select:
select * from consultation a
and a.status = 0 and a.`sex` = #{sex} and a.`id` = #{id} and a.name like concat('%',#{name},'%') and a.phone like concat('%',#{phone},'%') and a.qq like concat('%',#{qq},'%') and a.email like concat('%',#{email},'%') and a.desc like concat('%',#{desc},'%') and a.address like concat('%',#{address},'%')
